title: Kimpton Sir Francis Drake Hotel: The Grand Dame of San Francisco
description: Experience San Francisco at its finest, staying at one of the city’s most iconic hotels - Kimpton Sir Francis Drake Hotel. Boasting old-school ambience with quirky details, the hotel hosts drag queen brunches, the swinging sixties Starlight cocktail lounge and Beefeater doormen.  Located close to Union Square you'll also have bustling shopping, theatre and dining right on your doorstep. Stay five nights and enjoy daily two-for-one breakfast for two.
location_description: Kimpton Sir Francis Drake Hotel [215097] Kimpton Sir Francis Drake Hotel 5/07/2017 Escapes

title: Beachfront Hawaii at Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort
description: Aloha Hawaii! Tick Hawaii off your bucket list with eight nights at the Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa located on the world-famous Waikiki Beach and the Pacific Ocean. Immerse yourself in the resort's central location staying in a Guest Room with ocean views and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts and savings on local attractions such as Pearl Harbour tours, sunset cruises and more. Only $1,499 per person (twin share), valued up to $6,026. Plus, two kids stay free! Check out the resort video below.
location_description: Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa [205297] Waikiki Beach Marriott July Campaign

title: Grand Hyatt Luxury in The Heart of New York

Spend Seven Nights/Eight Days in a King Standard Room with Daily Breakfasts for Only $999 Per Person (Twin-Share), Valued at up to $4,770 for Two Adults

title: New York, New York: Unforgettable Times Square Stay
description: Experience the lights, sights and sounds of the Big Apple on a once-in-a-lifetime holiday to New York, the city that never sleeps. Stay right in the heart of the action at the spectacularly located Renaissance New York Times Square Hotel, rising 26 stories above the glittering Times Square. Enjoy seven nights with daily breakfasts, plus a cocktail each at the R Lounge which offers unbelievable panoramic views across Times Square, for only $999 per person (twin share), valued up to $5,357 for two adults. Family options available. Watch the hotel teaser video below.
location_description: Renaissance NYC Times Square [198714] New York, New York: Unforgettable Times Square Stay
offer_address: 714 Seventh Avenue, New York NY 10036 New York

title: Grand Hyatt Luxury in The Heart of New York
description: Experience the bright lights and dazzling sights of the Big Apple, staying seven nights at the Grand Hyatt New York - near Times Square and Broadway - just moments from NYC’s best brunch spots and iconic Wholefoods Market! PLUS free tickets to the top of the Empire State Building, a brand new audio tour of Grand Central Terminal and handy seven-day NYC metro card for two. Watch the video below.

title: Aspen's Top Hotel: Hotel Jerome
description: Take to the slopes in A-list style from the historic and award-winning Hotel Jerome, An Auberge Resort - ranked the number one hotel in Aspen, Colorado. Enjoy five nights in a Deluxe Room with daily breakfast credits, airport transfers, cocktail vouchers and more for two adults - plus one child stays free. Watch the video below.

vendor_name: Westin Riverfront Resort & Spa, Avon, Vail Valley
title: Ski Escape in the Heart of Vail Valley, Colorado
description: Experience Colorado’s world-renowned ski slopes with access to the famous Beaver Creek, Vail and Copper Mountain on your doorstep. Spend eight days/seven nights at the award-winning Westin Riverfront Resort & Spa with its own gondola taking you directly to Beaver Creek Mountain. Sit in front of your own fireplace in your breathtaking mountain view room, complimentary Beaver Creek Mountain shuttle service, Ski valet, daily buffet breakfast, daily cocktails, unlimited yoga, spa discounts and much more. Only $2,399 for two adults, valued up to $5,440. Watch the resort video below.
location_description: Westin Riverfront Resort & Spa [208363] Westin Riverfront Resort & Spa 30/06/2017 Escapes

title: Marriott Beachfront Paradise in Hawaii
description: Experience Marriott Luxury in Hawaii. Spend eight nights at Wakiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa, located just steps from the world-famous Waikiki Beach and the Pacific Ocean. Enjoy the resorts iconic central location with daily buffet breakfast vouchers, cocktails, savings on a surfing lesson, Pearl Harbour tours, sunset cruises and more. Only $2,499 for two adults, valued up to $5,018. Plus two kids stay free. See the resort video below.
location_description: Waikiki Beach Marriott Resort & Spa [187356] Marriott Beachfront Paradise in Hawaii

title: La La Land Luxury in Beverly Hills
description: Experience LA’s glamorous playground for the rich and famous with a celebrity-style escape brought to you by one of the world’s leading high-end hotel groups. Spend four nights at the five-star Viceroy L'Ermitage Beverly Hills located minutes from the designer boutiques of Rodeo Drive and within easy reach of the ultra-cool Venice Beach and the glitzy Hollywood Walk of Fame. Giving A-list luxury a new meaning, the scripts for Good Will Hunting and The Godfather were penned in the hotel’s lobby lounge and today celebs and socialites escape to the Viceroy looking for privacy and impeccable service. Includes daily breakfasts, bubbly on arrival and more for only $2,699 for two adults, valued up to $5,158. Check out the hotel video below.
location_description: Viceroy L'Ermitage Beverly Hills [209164] Viceroy L'Ermitage Beverly Hills 27/06/2017 Escapes

title: New York Doubletree by Hilton City Break near Times Square
description: Stay in the beating heart of New York's concrete jungle at Doubletree Times Square West, located a stone's throw from Times Square. Immerse yourself in the best of the iconic city, with the Empire State Building, The Jacob Javits Convention Center, and Broadway just a 15-minute walk away, and a plethora of restaurants and bars right outside your door. When you don't feel like venturing far for your next meal, the hotel's all-American diner Tranzit Restaurant & Bar is your go-to for tasty comfort food, while cityscape panoramas and handcrafted cocktails are on the menu at High Bar rooftop bar. If walking the streets of NYC isn't enough to get the heart racing, the onsite fitness centre's modern facilities will do the trick.
offer_address: 350 W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, United States
